REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1767 reute r f BC-NORTHVIEW-<NOVC.O>-PL 10-19 0077

TEXT.TITLE: NORTHVIEW <NOVC.O> PLANS TO SELL COMPANY
TEXT.BODY: Northview Corp said it reached an agreement in principal covering the acquisition of the company by privately-held Calmark Financial Corp. The agreement calls for Northview to make a self-tender offer for all of its outstanding stock at a price of 22 dlrs per share in cash. Calmark, headquartered in Los Angeles, develops, manages and syndicates real estate, Northview also said. Reuter
